metadata.title: CVE-2024-40956 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dmaengine: idxd: Fix possible Use-After-Free in irq_process_work_listUse list_for_each_entry_safe() to allow iterating through the list anddeleting the entry in the iteration process. The descriptor is freed viaidxd_desc_complete() and there's a slight chance may cause issue forthe list iterator when the descriptor is reused by another threadwithout it being deleted from the list.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
